name: LoveHug
description:
Basically made in one day (you can check progress here). Very far from what is imagined, but some of the mechanics are already there ;) (writing this at 2:45am)

The main idea was to create a platformer where you need to cooperate, but also can interfere with each other in fun ways.

I figured that one day is a very limited time for a jam, but I really wanted to participate in UE4 Winter Game Jam.  Still, the work on this project will be continued until the end of this week, I suppose...
